price: 4. y que el insensato de entre nosotros (Iblis)[1087] decía contra Al-lah mentiras de gran consideración.
arabic: وَأَنَّهُۥ كَانَ يَقُولُ سَفِيهُنَا عَلَى ٱللَّهِ شَطَطٗا
footnotes: [1087]  Ver la nota de la aleya 34 de la sura 2.

version.title: Spanish Translation (Latin America) - Noor International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish (Latin America) by Noor International (Ed. 2017)

meta.transliteration: wa-annahu kāna yaqūlu safīhunā ʿalā al-lahi shaṭaṭan
